How well do you handle stress and pressure?
I'd say I'm pretty good at handling stress.
Part of that is having a very effective management of the workload that's in front of you...
...whether that be having a very tight schedule,...
...or making sure that you're hitting those deadlines.
I think it's also really important to realize...
...that there will be stress in the work environment,...
...but not letting that negatively affect your work or your production.
